<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ancillary Motes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2484) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aphorite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=335" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Crystalline Dust](/Feats.aspx?ID=2480)

</column>

---

You can use Crystalline Dust one more time per day.

**Special** You can take this feat more than once, gaining one more use of Crystalline Dust per day each time.
name: Ancillary Motes
